title: Sheryl Underwood, Reparations, JAB Women's Day, Stacey Dash and more.
itunes:title: Sheryl Underwood, Reparations, JAB Women's Day, Stacey Dash and more.
description:
Good morning and welcome to the ride! The entire crew is here including both Fools! The Chief Love Officer gets a letter about wings and a barbershop. Stacey Dash apologizes for supporting Trump and has a change of heart. Fool #2 honors the ladies that gave us great sayings that have been passed down through the centuries. The love skunk has been cut from LBJ's new movie Space Jam 2. Somebody made a very controversial remark while speaking about reparations and the COVID-19 relief bill. Steve brings his lil' sister Sheryl Underwood back on the show to share her feelings about what happened with Sharon Osborne on The Talk. The show wraps up today with a story about Junior's nephew.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Good morning and welcome to the ride! The entire crew is here including both Fools! The Chief Love Officer gets a letter about wings and a barbershop. The love skunk has been cut from LBJ's new movie Space Jam 2. Somebody made a very controversial remark while speaking about reparations and the COVID-19 relief bill. Steve brings his lil' sister Sheryl Underwood back on the show to share her feelings about what happened with Sharon Osborne on The Talk. The show wraps up today with a story about Junior's nephew.
